Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
``` C#
Console.Write("helloworld!");
```




Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)

--- title: Kz.layedit keywords: Kz.layedit categories: - tags: - LayUI - JavaScript - abbrlink: f8ce822e --- ## [Kz.layedit](http://knifez.gitee.io/kz.layedit/index.html)! layui.layedit ### htmlhr ### undo\redo ### 2018-12-20 1IEIE12 2,,.,,.... 3 ## ### toolbartool ``` javascript tool: [ 'html'// ,'undo','redo' //-- ,'code', 'strong', 'italic', 'underline', 'del', ,'addhr' // ,'|', 'fontFomatt','fontfamily','fontSize', // 'colorpicker', 'fontBackColor'// , 'face', '|', 'left', 'center', 'right', '|', 'link', 'unlink' 'image'// 'images'// , 'image_alt'// , 'attachment'// , 'video' // ,'anchors' // , '|', 'table'// ,'customlink'// ,'fullScreen'// 'preview'// ] ``` : [layui.layeidt v1.0.9](https://www.layui.com/v1/doc/modules/layedit.html#use) ### | | | | | :------| ------: | :------: | | tool/hideTool/height | -- | | | uploadImage | object | urlmethoddataheadersacceptacceptMimeextssizefield [layupload](https://www.layui.com/doc/modules/upload.html#options) | | uploadVideo | object | urlmethoddataheadersacceptacceptMimeextssizefield [layupload](https://www.layui.com/doc/modules/upload.html#options) | | uploadFiles | object | urlmethoddataheadersacceptacceptMimeextssizefield [layupload](https://www.layui.com/doc/modules/upload.html#options) | | calldel | object | / | | devmode | bool | reltarget | | autoSync | bool | textareafalse | | onchange | function | | | codeConfig | object | | | quote | object | /js | | customTheme | object | | | videoAttr | string | video | | customlink | object | hrefatext | | facePath | string | file:// | | rightBtn | object | type,customEventtypedefault/layBtn/custom | | previewAttr | object | layeroffsetareaoffset ,area | ### #### uploadImage/Video/Files layupload[layupload](https://www.layui.com/doc/modules/upload.html#options)ImageVideourlsizeweb {code:0,msg:"",data:{src:""}} {code:1,msg:"",data:{src:""}} {code:2,msg:"",data:{src:""}} uploadImage {accept: 'image',acceptMime: 'image/*',exts: 'jpg|png|gif|bmp|jpeg',size: 1024 * 10,} uploadVideo { accept: 'video', acceptMime: 'video/*', exts: 'mp4|flv|avi|rm|rmvb', size: 1024 * 10 * 2, } uploadFiles { accept: 'file', acceptMime: 'file/*', size: '20480',} ``` javascript uploadImage: { url: 'your url', accept: 'image', acceptMime: 'image/*', exts: 'jpg|png|gif|bmp|jpeg', size: 1024 * 10, done: function (data) { console.log(data); } } uploadVideo: { url: 'your url', accept: 'video', acceptMime: 'video/*', exts: 'mp4|flv|avi|rm|rmvb', size: 1024 * 10 * 2, done: function (data) { console.log(data); } } uploadFiles: { url: 'your url', accept: 'file', acceptMime: 'file/*', size: '20480', done: function (data) { console.log(data); } } ``` #### callDel post imgpath -- filepath -- imgpath -- filepath -- ``` javascript calldel: { url: 'your url', done: function (data) { console.log(data); } } ``` #### devmode false,reltarget #### autoSync falsetruetextarea #### onchange contenthtml ``` javascript onchange: function (content) { console.log(content); } ``` #### codeConfig hidefalse truedefault ``` javascript codeConfig: { hide: true, // default: 'javascript' //hidetrue } ``` #### quote stylejs ``` javascript quote:{ style: ['Content/css.css'], //js: ['/Content/Layui-KnifeZ/lay/modules/jquery.js'] } ``` #### customTheme () class,video ``` html
```

``` javascript customTheme: { video: { title: ['', 'custom_1', 'custom_2'] , content: ['', 'theme1', 'theme2'] , preview: ['', '/images/prive.jpg', '/images/prive2.jpg'] } } ``` #### videoAttr video ``` javascript videoAttr: ' preload="none" ' ``` #### customlink hreftitlehrefonmouseuponmouseup ``` javascript customlink:{ title: 'layui' , href: 'https://www.layui.com' ,onmouseup:'' } ``` #### facePath file:// #### rightBtn typecustomEventtype default,laybtn,custom default layBtnpimgvideotd/tr customcustomEvent ``` javascript rightBtn: { type: "layBtn",//default|layBtn|custom /layedit/ defaultlayBtncustomEvent customEvent: function (targetName, event) { //tagName switch (targetName) { case "img": alert("this is img"); break; default: alert("hello world"); break; }; // //alert("all in one"); } } ``` #### previewAttr layeroffsetareaoffset ,arealayer --kz.layedit v1.0.3.2 beta star

                url: 'your url',
                accept: 'image',
                acceptMime: 'image/*',
                exts: 'jpg|png|gif|bmp|jpeg',

                    console.log(data);
                }
            }

            uploadVideo: {
                url: 'your url',
                accept: 'video',
                acceptMime: 'video/*',
                exts: 'mp4|flv|avi|rm|rmvb',
                size: 1024 * 10 * 2,
                done: function (data) {

                }
            }

                url: 'your url',

                acceptMime: 'file/*',

 rightBtn: {
                type: "layBtn",//default|layBtn|custom  /layedit/ defaultlayBtncustomEvent
                customEvent: function (targetName, event) {
                    //tagName
                    switch (targetName) {
                        case "img":
                            alert("this is img");
                            break;
                        default:
                            alert("hello world");
                            break;
                    };
                    //
                    //alert("all in one");
                }
            }
